srprofile.uid_desc: UID gim anda, jika tidak diberikan akan menggunakan UID yang dibind.
srprofile.no_characters: No characters are set as support or starfaring companions.

srchronicle.desc: Lihat profil chronicle anda dari HoyoLab.

srcharacters.desc: See your characters data from HoyoLab.

srsimuniverse.desc: See your simulated universe progress from HoyoLab.

srmoc.desc: See your Memory of Chaos data from HoyoLab.
srmoc.previous_desc: See the previous period instead of the current one.
srmoc.no_data: No challenge data found for this period.

srbind.ask_action: What do you want to do with UID `{uid}`?
srbind.desc: Bind UID akun dengan akun Discord anda.
srbind.timeout: You didn't response in time, please try again.
srbind.binded: Your UID has been binded to your Discord account.
srbind.removed: Your UID has been removed from your Discord account.
srbind.not_bind: You haven't binded the provided UID yet.
srbind.already_bind: You have already binded the provided UID.

srhoyobind.desc: Bind your Hoyolab account to your Discord account.
srhoyobind.desc_id: The Hoyolab account ID you want to bind.
srhoyobind.desc_token: The Hoyolab account token you want to bind.
srhoyobind.desc_cookie_token: The Hoyolab account cookie token you want to bind.
srhoyobind.desc_mid_token: The Hoyolab account ltmid token that you want to bind. (Only for v2 token)
srhoyobind.invalid_token: Invalid token provided, unable to bind.
srhoyobind.already_bind: You have already binded your Hoyolab account, do you want to replace it?
srhoyobind.timeout: You didn't response in time, please try again.
srhoyobind.binded: Your Hoyolab account has been binded to your Discord account.
srhoyobind.bind_first:
You need to bind any UID first before binding your Hoyolab account.
Use `/srbind` to bind your UID.
srhoyobind.need_ltmid: You need to provide hoyo_mid_token (or `ltmid`) to the command for this work.

srchoices.ask_account: Which account do you want to see?
srchoices.timeout: You didn't response in time, please try again.

srdaily.desc: Claim your HoyoLab daily check-in rewards.
srdaily.already_claimed: You have already claimed your daily check-in rewards.

srhelp.initial_help_desc: The initial help menu that you want to see.
